title: Piyush Singh
content: dont'buy this laptop, there is no backlit keyboard. If u ask them they will blame dell and dell people will blame amazon. The laptop is defective one and product was already registered on someone else name on17th sept, although i ordered it on 2nd oct. Its is a big scam, nothing is working in laptop

title: K
content:
I was Using Dell Inspiron 15R 5520, for last more than 8 years and It was very good and Durable Laptop, As it was somewhat slow for my Usage Requirement, I replaced it with This Laptop, And In two Months Laptop Speakers Stop Working and Laptop Heating Problem, So Logged Complaint, Speaker and Fan Replaced, After Replacement also Speakers not working so Technician Found it is motherBoard Problem, so Mother Board will be replaced,

In Short Dell Build and Manufacturing Quality has deteriorated over time.

title: Amazon Customer
content: I had a very bad experience purchasing this laptop. It had sound issue and screen flickering issue. I will not recommend this product to anyone.

title: Rupa Kar
content: Bought a Dell Vostro 3400 on 2nd Nov 2001 from Amazon! In a couple of weeks had Audio/Speaker/Microphone issues. Lodged a service request on 25th Nov 2021 with Dell Technical Support and still today i.e 16th Dec 2021 my issues remained unresolved !! Amazon couldn't give any support in this regard. A photo of 29th Nov is attached. Don't buy Dell laptops as they have horrible after sales service !!

title: Madhusudhan
content: I faced audio issues. Liaising with Dell technical support for last one month. Still not resolved. 3 times hardware has been changed but the issues is not resolved. The support works 9 to 6 Monday to Friday. You need make time for them. Numerous calls, but issue is not resolves. You would buy a dell laptop if you have committed a sin in your previous life.

title: Nived
content: Waste product. Starts complaint within one week. Amazon replaced the product and new product also full of complaints. Irresponsible customer service. They never solve your problem. Complaint coming in each weeks. Waste of money. Go for other companies. Don't buy Dell products. Rating:0
